transcript: this is probably one of the biggest mistakes that business owners make let's say I sell these for $10 but it costs me $9 and the average person buys $10 P so it's $100 in Revenue but it costs me $90 to sell the 100 but if my team comes to me and says dude we're killing it we're spending $50 to get a $100 sale we should do this all day but what's really happening I'm actually spending $50 to make $10 in gross profit not a good equation
